info.brief_description: What if mankind never had to invent clothing?
info.description:
Imagine if you will that mankind never had to invent clothing. Imagine every man, woman, and even children living their lives 24/7 completely naked. They don't even have to wear shoes, because they can go without shoes, but it is as if they were wearing shoes so that their feet will not feel any pain or suffer any type of harm if they stepped on anything that wouldn't affect them if they were wearing shoes. Yet despite people being naked all the time, people still get turned on by nudity after they've hit puberty. There is no shame, their bodies are unaffected by cold weather and everyone is extremely handsome and sexy and full of lust.
